channel.title: CVE Feed for StandaloneTech -- TeraWallet – For WooCommerce

item.title: CVE-2024-32584|2024-04-18T09:14:24.718Z -- StandaloneTech -- TeraWallet – For WooCommerce
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in StandaloneTech TeraWallet – For WooCommerce allows Stored XSS.This issue affects TeraWallet – For WooCommerce: from n/a through 1.5.0.
